sentences.english: Provides a weekly report of any plant or equipment witch is Out Of Order and the action taken.
sentences.chinese: 提供發生故障的機房或設備的週報告以及採取的行動。

sentences.english: I didn't understand until you tell me.
I have just received your letter telling me your recent marriage.
sentences.chinese: 頃接來函，承你告我近日結婚。

sentences.english: Eight salute to heaven and earth, let the heavens and the earth for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 八門禮炮告天地，同心同德天地久。

sentences.english: Also fluid intake and urine output is often recorded and should be noted and reported on rounds.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還應記錄攝人液體量及尿量以便在查房時報告。

sentences.english: 8226; He ran for the Vice-presidential nomination in 1856, and lost that too.
sentences.chinese: 1856年，他競選副總統候選人提名，也告失利。

sentences.english: Give back my toy, or I will tell Dad on you.
sentences.chinese: 把東西還給我，否則的話我赴向爸爸告你狀。

sentences.english: When I got home. I rushed into the house to tell my wife what I was going to do.
sentences.chinese: 抵家的時期，我衝進屋裏，念睹告老婆我的籌算。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Shandong reported that this new deep-water port in the early 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 該港是山東告80年代初新闢的深水港。

sentences.english: You mean to tell me you've never been up there doing a little cloud-seeding?
sentences.chinese: 你不要告我你從未做過雲端撒種這種事？

sentences.english: His sister told on him though he tried to shush her.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他想叫她別聲張，可妹妹還是告了他。

sentences.english: The last time the Spurs have been nothing back, was forced to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 馬刺最後時刻的反撲也告無功而返，被迫繳械投降。

sentences.chinese: 告價格細目表及發貨條件。

sentences.english: 3The chief priests accused him of many things.
He often tells on his classmates.
The Coliseum was used for shows until 608 AD.
sentences.chinese: 競技場的演出用途到了公元608年才告結束。
